profile.name: Aweke Olawale
profile.description: Frontend developer with more than 5 years of professional experience.

about.intro: I enjoy building fine interactive UIs that are both aesthetically pleasing and easy to use. I have created excellent solutions with frameworks such as VueJS, Flutter and React.
